resources.string: Unknown error occurred during API call! Maybe turn on internet connection?
Unauthorized - You either need an API key or your account tier does not have access to the endpoint.
Bad Request - The request is invalid. The request parameters are probably incorrect.
Not Found - The specified resource could not be found.
Not Acceptable - You requested a format that isn\'t json.
Too Many Requests - You\'re rate limited.
Internal Server Error - We had a problem with our server. Try again later.
Service Unavailable - We\'re temporarily offline for maintenance. Please try again later.
